mapper.select: select m.movie_genre, count(m.movie_genre), row_number() over(order by count(m.movie_genre) DESC) from evaluations E join movies M on(e.movie_code = m.movie_code) where e.user_id = #{userId} group by m.movie_genre

select m.movie_nation, count(m.movie_nation), row_number() over(order by count(m.movie_nation) DESC) from evaluations E join movies M on(e.movie_code = m.movie_code) where e.user_id = #{userId} group by m.movie_nation

select * from (select mv.*, row_number() over(order by DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE) as NUM from movies MV where mv.movie_genre IN (select total.movie_genre from (select m.movie_genre, count(m.movie_genre), row_number() over(order by count(m.movie_genre) DESC) from evaluations e join movies m on(e.movie_code = m.movie_code) where e.user_id =#{userId} group by m.movie_genre) TOTAL where ROWNUM <=3) and mv.movie_code NOT IN (select ev.movie_code from evaluations EV where ev.user_id=#{userId})) where NUM between #{page}+1 and #{page}+6
